remarks: The composition of two different translations is not the identity translation.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Jul-2013.)
statement:
trlconid.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
trlconid.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
trlconid.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlconid.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlconid $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ G e. T ) /\ ( R ` F ) =/= ( R ` G ) ) -> ( F o. G ) =/= ( _I |` B ) ) $.
